title: MacBook Pro 2018 review: can it stand the heat?
description: The new MacBook Pros are here with modern processors, an updated keyboard, and True Tone displays. In this week's Processor episode, Dieter explores whether these changes are enough to make professionals trust these machines. After benchmarking the MacBook Pro last week, we retested the core i9 with new software that fixed our thermal throttling issues. But, that question of trust still remains.   Correction: The video features a specs graphic with "Radeon Pro 650x 4VRAM." This should read "Radeon Pro 560x 4VRAM."
